Posts.Content: elainebarbarick wrote: My friend had a mastectomy and her implant was done on 10/12/2011. She went to the PS office today(10/14/2011) to show them how flat it is. She was told that the implant will pop out. Has this happen to anyone else or does this not sound right?  Also, My friend is afraid she is going to look like a freak and her breasts are going to be really uneven. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Has anyone had an implant that was flat? elainebarbarick elainebarbarick
